body: Really good hentai and my balls are all numb from fapping every time I see each translated chapters. Good work translator-san
itadakimasu.
Another generic molestation type doujin. Sigh

Now a bad new: Erelzen is taking a break from translation so he won't be working on the rest of the series (still, thank you Erelzen for translating chapters 1 - 5!).
As for me, I still want to work on the rest of the series. But to do so, I'm looking for a new translator. If you want to help, you can try going to E-H where I created three translation bounties for chapters 6, 7, 8 and add some credits/hath (I'll create more for the sequel&bonus and for the new chapters 1-2 too). Once I receive the scripts, I'll once again work on this series.

Editor's here!
Now, as some of you might have realised, the translation of this series stopped for a while. This is due to several reason:
The raw of the chapters 5-8 were... well... bad. Text was blurry and Erelzen, the translator, had quite a lot of problems in order to do his job. In order to avoid having the same problem for chapters 6-8 (& bonus+sequel), we decided to create a little bounty on E-h in order to find better scans. While we had to wait, this was a success and we obtained better scans with readable text. Then I started working on this chapter.
However something unexpected happened: The artist, Anma, released a new version of Mukuchi Shoujo. New chapters 1 - 2... and also... with transparent censorship. Transparent censorship is something fairly easy to remove so I decided to redo everything from the scratch.
This is basically why I took so much time to release the translation of this chapter.
